Class PercentageDiscount

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.DiscountDecorator
cop4331.model.PercentageDiscount
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductComponent
public class PercentageDiscount extends DiscountDecorator

Applies a percentage discount to the price of the product. Extends the DiscountDecorator class.

Author:
Denis Ziegler, Benjamin Carver

  • Constructor Details

    • PercentageDiscount

      public PercentageDiscount(ProductComponent productComponent, double percentage)

      Constructs a PercentageDiscount object.

      Parameters:
      productComponent - The product to be discounted.
      percentage - The discount percentage.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If percentage is negative or if percentage is greater than 1.
